item.title: Mysterious php errors
item.description: Sometimes you get an error like that: container extension liip_imagine not registered You double-checked all configurations and you are absolutely sure nothing is wrong. But code not works, why? Because Php can’t convert i to I if os language is tr_TR. Your code searches LiipÄ°magine and can’t find that. Change os’s lang code to en_US.UTF-8 for fix that. Or add this line to .bashrc or .profile file. export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 bb.
